biotools.summary:
It is a novel sensitive method for the detection of user-defined compositional bias in biological sequences.
It automatically searches a user-supplied protein sequence for segments that contain unusually dense clusters of user-specified amino acid types and computes analytical estimates of the statistical significance of each cluster.

bioschemas.name: ProBias
